title: Talking to Baby
contenttemplated:

Research shows the more words babies hear, the better they do in school. The achievement gap starts early; now so do new efforts to close it.

contentencoded:
Research shows the more words babies hear, the better they do in school. The achievement gap starts early; now so do new efforts to close it.


Guest: Dr. Dana Suskind, Founder, Thirty Million Words Initiative.
